tool.name: Picard Collect Sequencing Artifact Metrics
tool.description: writes 5 tables containing Phred-scaled error rates substitution details and summaries

validator.message: A built-in dictionary is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: ref_file
param.label: Use the following dataset to create dictionary
param.help: You can upload a FASTA sequence to the history from which Picard will automatically generate dictionary using CreateSequenceDictionary command

param.name: context_size
param.label: How many nucleotides (context) on each side to consider
param.help: e.g NXN corresponds to 1 "N" on each side of "X"

param.name: contexts_to_print
param.label: Contexts to print in the detailed tables, separated by comma
param.help: e.g. (for context size=1) AAA,AGG. Default prints all contexts

data.name: pre_details
data.label: Detailed table for artifacts introduced prior to the addition of adapters

data.name: pre_summary
data.label: Summary table for artifacts introduced prior to the addition of adapters

data.name: pos_details
data.label: Detailed table for artifacts introduced posterior to the addition of adapters

data.name: pos_summary
data.label: Summary table for artifacts introduced posterior to the addition of adapters

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Purpose**
Program to chart the distribution of potential sequencing "single nucleotide mutation" artifacts in a SAM or BAM file.
@dataset_collections@
@description@
ASSUME_SORTED=Boolean If true (default), then the sort order in the header file will be ignored. Default: True
CONTEXT_SIZE=integer The number of context bases to include on each side of the assayed base.
CONTEXT_SIZE_TO_PRINT=String If specified, only print results for these contexts in the detail metrics output. However, the summary metrics output will still take all contexts into consideration.
DB_SNP=text file VCF format dbSNP file, used to exclude regions around known polymorphisms from analysis.
INCLUDE_DUPLICATES=Boolean Include duplicate reads. If set to true then all reads flagged as duplicates will be included as well.
INCLUDE_UNPAIRED=Boolean Include unpaired reads. If set to true then all paired reads will be included as well - MINIMUM_INSERT_SIZE and MAXIMUM_INSERT_SIZE will be ignored.
MAXIMUM_INSERT_SIZE=Integer The maximum insert size for a read to be included in analysis. Set to 0 to have no maximum. Default = 600
MINIMUM_INSERT_SIZE=Integer The minimum insert size for a read to be included in analysis. Default = 60
MINIMUM_MAPPING_QUALITY The minimum mapping quality score for a base to be included in analysis. Default = 30
MINIMUM_QUALITY_SCORE The minimum base quality score for a base to be included in analysis. Default = 20
@more_info@
